verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Go <WH935> in to Pharaoh: <WH6547> for I have hardened <WH3513> his heart, <WH3820> and the heart <WH3820> of his servants, <WH5650> that I might show <WH7896> these <WH428> my signs <WH226> before <WH7130> him:

And that you may tell <WH5608> in the ears <WH241> of your son, <WH1121> and of your son's <WH1121> son, <WH1121> what <WH853> <WH834> things I have worked <WH5953> in Egypt, <WH4714> and my signs <WH226> which <WH834> I have done <WH7760> among them; that you may know <WH3045> how that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> in to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and said <WH559> to him, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of the Hebrews, <WH5680> How <WH5704> long <WH4970> will you refuse <WH3985> to humble <WH6031> yourself before <WH6440> me? let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve <WH5647> me.
Else, <WH3588> if <WH518> you refuse <WH3986> to let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> behold, <WH2005> to morrow <WH4279> will I bring <WH935> the locusts <WH697> into your coast: <WH1366>

And they shall cover <WH3680> the face <WH5869> of the earth, <WH776> that one cannot <WH3808> be able <WH3201> to see <WH7200> the earth: <WH776> and they shall eat <WH398> the residue <WH3499> of that which is escaped, <WH6413> which remains <WH7604> to you from the hail, <WH1259> and shall eat <WH398> every <WH3605> tree <WH6086> which grows <WH6779> for you out of the field: <WH7704>

And they shall fill <WH4390> your houses, <WH1004> and the houses <WH1004> of all <WH3605> your servants, <WH5650> and the houses <WH1004> of all <WH3605> the Egyptians; <WH4714> which <WH834> neither <WH3808> your fathers, <WH1> nor <WH3808> your fathers' <WH1> fathers <WH1> have seen, <WH7200> since <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that they were on the earth <WH127> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117> And he turned <WH6437> himself, and went <WH3318> out from Pharaoh. <WH6547>

And Pharaoh's <WH6547> servants <WH5650> said <WH559> to him, How <WH4970> long <WH5704> shall this <WH2088> man be a snare <WH4170> to us? let the men <WH582> go, <WH7971> that they may serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> their God: <WH430> know <WH3045> you not yet <WH2962> that Egypt <WH4714> is destroyed? <WH6>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> were brought <WH7725> again <WH7725> to Pharaoh: <WH6547> and he said <WH559> to them, Go, <WH3212> serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430> but who <WH4310> are they that shall go? <WH1980>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> We will go <WH3212> with our young <WH5288> and with our old, <WH2205> with our sons <WH1121> and with our daughters, <WH1323> with our flocks <WH6629> and with our herds <WH1241> will we go; <WH3212> for we must hold a feast <WH2282> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And he said <WH559> to them, Let the LORD <WH3068> be so <WH3651> with you, as I will let you go, <WH7971> and your little <WH2945> ones: look <WH7200> to it; for evil <WH7451> is before <WH6440> you.

Not so: <WH3651> go <WH3212> now <WH4994> you that are men, <WH1397> and serve <WH5647> the LORD; <WH3068> for that you did desire. <WH1245> And they were driven <WH1644> out from Pharaoh's <WH6547> presence. <WH5869>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Stretch <WH5186> out your hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for the locusts, <WH697> that they may come <WH5927> up on the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and eat <WH398> every <WH3605> herb <WH6212> of the land, <WH776> even <WH853> all <WH3605> that the hail <WH1259> has left. <WH7604>

And Moses <WH4872> stretched <WH5186> forth his rod <WH4294> over <WH5921> the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH5090> an east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> on the land <WH776> all <WH3605> that day, <WH3117> and all <WH3605> that night; <WH3915> and when it was morning, <WH1242> the east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> brought <WH5375> the locusts. <WH697>

And the locusts <WH697> went <WH5927> up over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and rested <WH5117> in all <WH3605> the coasts <WH1366> of Egypt: <WH4714> very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> were they; before <WH6440> them there were no <WH3808> such <WH3651> locusts <WH697> as they, neither <WH3808> after <WH310> them shall be such.

For they covered <WH3680> the face <WH5869> of the whole <WH3605> earth, <WH776> so that the land <WH776> was darkened; <WH2821> and they did eat <WH398> every <WH3605> herb <WH6212> of the land, <WH776> and all <WH3605> the fruit <WH6529> of the trees <WH6086> which <WH834> the hail <WH1259> had left: <WH3498> and there remained <WH3498> not any <WH3605> green <WH3418> thing in the trees, <WH6086> or in the herbs <WH6212> of the field, <WH7704> through all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
Then Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in haste; <WH4116> and he said, <WH559> I have sinned <WH2398> against the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and against you.

Now <WH6258> therefore forgive, <WH5375> I pray <WH4994> you, my sin <WH2403> only <WH389> this once, <WH6471> and entreat <WH6279> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> that he may take <WH5493> away from me this <WH2088> death <WH4194> only. <WH7535>
And he went <WH3318> out from Pharaoh, <WH6547> and entreated <WH6279> the LORD. <WH3068>

And the LORD <WH3068> turned <WH2015> a mighty <WH3966> strong <WH2389> west <WH3220> wind, <WH7307> which took <WH5375> away the locusts, <WH697> and cast <WH8628> them into the Red <WH5488> sea; <WH3220> there remained <WH7604> not one <WH259> locust <WH697> in all <WH3605> the coasts <WH1366> of Egypt. <WH4714>
But the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart, <WH3820> so that he would not let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> go. <WH7971>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Stretch <WH5186> out your hand <WH3027> toward <WH5921> heaven, <WH8064> that there may be darkness <WH2822> over <WH5921> the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> even darkness <WH2822> which may be felt. <WH4959>

And Moses <WH4872> stretched <WH5186> forth his hand <WH3027> toward <WH5921> heaven; <WH8064> and there was a thick <WH653> darkness <WH2822> in all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> three <WH7969> days: <WH3117>

They saw <WH7200> not one <WH376> another, <WH251> neither <WH3808> rose <WH6965> any <WH376> from his place <WH8478> for three <WH7969> days: <WH3117> but all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had <WH1961> light <WH216> in their dwellings. <WH4186>

And Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> to Moses, <WH4872> and said, <WH559> Go <WH3212> you, serve <WH5647> the LORD; <WH3068> only <WH7535> let your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241> be stayed: <WH3322> let your little <WH2945> ones also <WH1571> go <WH3212> with you.
And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> You must give <WH5414> us also <WH1571> sacrifices <WH2077> and burnt <WH5930> offerings, that we may sacrifice <WH2077> to the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>

Our cattle <WH4735> also <WH1571> shall go <WH3212> with us; there shall not an hoof <WH6541> be left <WH7604> behind; for thereof must we take <WH3947> to serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> our God; <WH430> and we know <WH3045> not with what <WH4100> we must serve <WH5647> the LORD, <WH3068> until <WH5704> we come <WH935> thither. <WH8033>
But the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart, <WH3820> and he would <WH14> not let them go. <WH7971>

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> to him, Get <WH3212> you from me, take <WH3947> heed <WH8104> to yourself, see <WH7200> my face <WH6440> no <WH3808> more; <WH3254> for in that day <WH3117> you see <WH7200> my face <WH6440> you shall die. <WH4191>
And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> You have spoken <WH1696> well, <WH3651> I will see <WH7200> your face <WH6440> again <WH3254> no <WH3808> more. <WH5750>
